snippet.title: One Last Breath – Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Embody Gaia in our latest 2.5D platformer/puzzler, and weave through a post-apocalyptic world desperate for revival. Your touch rekindles life. 

Available March 28, 2024 on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch Stores and Steam 
And soon in all best physical stores 
 
- 
 
Follow us on our socials to keep up with One Last Breath: 
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/OLBGame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/onelastbreathgame/
